Version 2.x


The version 1.0 was more a proof concept that we can read the ESSnuSB root files (detector and events) and do the connection with the softinex graphics running on most interactive devices we have today.

The version 2.x (2.0.0 released end Sep 2019) comes with more physics and a bash-like scripting mechanism that permits to cover, with the same program, various detectors as the "neard", the "fard" and the "fgd" ones (ESSnuSB terminology at Sep/2019). It comes also with the "show event in time" feature that can help a lot for outreach.

To proceed with version 2.x, the best is to read the further sections by order, it will explain a lot.
